relevant_findings.HEENT: sclera anicteric, mucus membranes slightly dry, nares clear, trachea at midline
relevant_findings.CV: sinus tachycardia, no appreciable murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.abd: obese, chronic dermatitis of rectus sheath procurement site, mildly distended, tender to palpation in lower quadrants (LLQ>RLQ), able to appreciate fullness in the LLQ likely phlegmon without overlying skin changes
relevant_findings.GU: DRE performed earlier demonstrated no blood, + sphincter tone
relevant_findings.MSK: warm, well perfused with well-healed LLE myocutaneous flap
relevant_findings.neuro: alert, oriented to person, place, time
